Package chess

Enum PieceType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PieceType>
      • chess.PieceType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PieceType>
    public enum PieceType
extends java.lang.Enum<PieceType>
    Enum representing the possible types of chess pieces such as Rook, Knight etc.
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan

    • Enum Constant Summary
